description:
———— ATTENTION: Marketers of High-Ticket Services ————

Hi, I'm Frans van Agthoven. You probably want to know if I am legit. If this course is legit. Of course. Let me show you a few PMs I got on Facebook... and a few reviews

—But first: Check out the quick lil promo video on the TOP LEFT of this page :)

####################################################################

Hey mate,

After 2 not so good skype meetings, i found out your video about how you do your skype meetings and the other 2 skype meetings i had went amazing.

Got my first sale with your structure:)

- Selçuk Selvi

Hey man just thought i'd say thanks so much for your videos on SSM wiki, helped me out a ridiculous amount! Finally gaining some momentum cheers

- Max Feller

no doubt ur stuff is legit bro
I've used a lot of what we discussed and help grow my business

- Steve Post

[...] practical techniques that I implemented on my business and it already made my communication with my clients much better.

- Felipe M

What I liked the most was the "how to pitch you product section". If you're trying to amp up the conversion on your landing page without getting neck deep in theoretical useless stuff, then this course is a must.

- Victor Acacio

[...] My favorite lesson was Section 3 - talking about how to get leads the most cost effective way in today's marketplace. You won't believe all of the great insights I learned just from a 15 minute conversation on this topic, but it's all right here.

- Jesse Bern

Sounds good right? :)

I could fill this entire page with reviews, but hit the "Reviews" to see more

####################################################################

Here's what the course is:

"DEPLOY & CONQUER" is a video marketing crash course on Udemy. It teaches you how to 'deploy' a short explainer video and sell more of your high-ticket services online.

It's packed with secrets and tactics, taken from the advertising industry, and practical lessons. I also show how I personally sell my high-ticket video production service.

I had to learn it the hard way—YOU don't have to.

Really. You would need the equivalent of a full university semester-long course and at least 3 months of industry experience to learn these lessons by yourself.

Screw that, right?

That's why the course is fast. It takes you from the start to finish of a proven marketing system—In 4 sections. Roughly 2,5 hours fast-paced video content.

It's simple to copy for your own business. It's visual, and makes use of examples.

You will have a clear strategy to put on the table. Bulletproof. With safety measures...

I've spent the last 3 years producing and testing ad-videos for websites. I've brought my clients unexpected great success and sometimes just a high quality video that helps understand.

Not all videos had impact. But in all cases I've learned a lot.

I have worked with high-tech startups, to (dutch) universities and big companies like WeTransfer.

Most companies hide their secrets. I like teaching. I like helping others improve their marketing. To help them make the next big sale, or a lot of small ones.

I've consulted more than 200 companies, including those in online business masterminds, like the Freedom Secret Society.

Get this course at the cost of 1 dinner for two at a cheap restaurant...
...and get the information that can DOUBLE or even TRIPLE your revenue.

You'll get these 2 bonus videos, previously strictly exclusive for a private business mastermind.

  1. How I Do Meetings
  2. How I Do Proposals

Besides this, I'm available for questions in the discussion sections. You would normally pay me €300,- for a single consultation.

This course -with lifetime access- is priced at 39 USD.

It's my first course, and I'm pretty sure it's a steal.

Besides that, Udemy has a 100% Money-Back Guarantee for 30 days.
So this is what you should do:

Go to the top right of this page and click "Take This Course". Make the payment (they have all the easy options), and watch only 2 videos. If that didn't give you 1 new practical idea, send an email to support@udemy.com and just ask for a refund.

No questions asked.

WARNING: I will definitely not be available for questions forever. So if you want to make use of the opportunity to ask me anything in the discussions section, do it while I'm still there.

P.S. Remember this course should make YOU more money through learning simple and proven marketing tactics.

P.P.S. Really. If it's not at least 100x more valuable than the price you paid, JUST GET YOUR MONEY BACK. ;)
title: Deploy & Conquer: Learn Explainer Video Business Secrets
